title: LinkedIn
description: The Ultimate Guide to LinkedIn Post Dimensions: Essential Insights

body.raw:
This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page, it means I'm still working on it. You can follow updates on Twitter [@designali_in](https://twitter.com/designali_in). --- ## Logos Logo is now just one color. Itâ€™s simpler, more modern, and helps name to read as one word.

Color codes:

```bash #2967b2 ```
--- # The Ultimate Guide to LinkedIn Post Dimensions: Essential Insights LinkedIn is a powerful platform for professionals to network, share insights, and promote their brands. To make the most of your LinkedIn presence, it's crucial to understand the ideal dimensions for various post types. Here's a comprehensive guide to help you optimize your LinkedIn content. ## Profile Picture - Recommended Size: 400 x 400 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Choose a high-quality, professional photo that clearly represents you or your brand. ## Cover Photo - Recommended Size: 1584 x 396 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Use this space to convey your brand's message or showcase a visually appealing image related to your field. ## Company Logo - Recommended Size: 300 x 300 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Ensure your logo is clear and recognizable at this size, as it represents your company across the platform. ## Banner Image for Company Page - Recommended Size: 1128 x 191 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Utilize this banner to highlight your company's achievements or latest updates. ## Shared Image - Recommended Size: 1200 x 627 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Choose eye-catching visuals that will engage your audience and encourage interaction. ## Shared Video - Recommended Size: Minimum width of 256 pixels and a maximum of 4096 x 2304 pixels - Length: 3 seconds to 10 minutes - File Type: MP4 - Tip: Keep videos concise and engaging to capture your audience's attention quickly. ## Article Images - Recommended Size: 744 x 400 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Use relevant and high-quality images to complement your article and attract readers. ## Ad Images - Recommended Size: 1200 x 627 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Craft visually appealing ads that align with your campaign goals and target audience. ## Carousel Images - Recommended Size: 1080 x 1080 pixels - File Type: PNG or JPEG - Tip: Utilize multiple images to tell a story or convey a more detailed message. ### General Tips - File Size: Keep images under 8 MB for best performance. - Aspect Ratio: Maintain recommended aspect ratios to prevent distortion or cropping. - Consistency: Use a consistent style and branding across all your visuals for a cohesive look. By adhering to these guidelines, you can ensure that your LinkedIn content is visually appealing and optimized for engagement. Make the most of your LinkedIn presence by leveraging the right dimensions for each type of post. --- Feel free to adjust any details to better suit your needs!
